articles.description: PUBG Mobile developers have announced that they will launch a new game called PUBG Mobile India to cater to Indian players. PUBG Mobile was banned back in September by the Indian government and around the same time, PUBG Corporation had announced that it will…

articles.title: iPhone 12 Pro and Pro Max vs. iPhone 11 Pro and Pro Max: Specs and features - CNET
